name: Traveling Light
description:
Roll along... Don't get zapped! Don't fall down!

Maneuver out this randomized maze by turning upside down, bouncing off of walls and escaping or destroy obstacles!

Walk on the cube's faces, be sure to escape the red Obstacles by jumping over them or trying another face. The yellow parts are their weakness and give your ball a shield. Make it to the end cube without dying.

  • Right or D key to move to the face on the right
  • Left or A key to move left face
  • Up or W key to jump over obstacles,  bounce on walls or fall over the edge
  • Esc or P Key pause

Traveling Light is a submission for the 48-hour Game Maker's Toolkit Jam, whose theme is "Downwell's Dual Purpose Design". Made by the wonderful Geleia team from Fellowship of the Game.

  • Programming: Andréia de Barros Carpi, Rafael Gallo
  • Art: Anayã Gimenes Ferreira
  • Sound: Gil Barbosa Reis
  • Game Concept Design:  Kaue Ueda
